Wind Energy Reaches New Heights

By John Doe January 20, 2026

Wind energy capacity has reached record levels globally, according to new industry data.

Offshore wind farms are driving much of the growth, with installations increasing by 30% year-over-year.

Advertisement: Buy our product!

Industry experts predict continued growth as costs continue to decline and technology improves.

The International Energy Agency forecasts wind could provide 35% of global electricity by 2040.
